entry.title: Monday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and blowing snow beginning early this morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 AM CDT Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Light snow and blowing snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Light snow and blowing snow ending this evening then cloudy. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 overnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 AM CDT Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 AM CDT Monday 24 April 2023
